amendment.description: Amendment directs the Administrator of EPA to cease any further hiring in the Agency's Office of Research and Development. \ As amended by the Lewis (CA) amendment (A017) the requirement that the EPA Administrator maintain funding of all existing scientific and technical support contracts at current levels was deleted.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of July 24, 1995, to made in order under the rule, to prohibit the Director of EPA from any further hiring in that Agency's Office of Research and Development and to require the Administrator to maintain the funding of all existing scientific and technical support contracts at not less than the current level.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis amendment (A016) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
